segments.text: can you help me pick out some fabric for a suit ? I'm going to get one made for a friend's wedding .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sure . What kind of material do you want for the suit to be made from ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it depends on the price , but I was thinking of getting a wool / cashmere blend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that will probably be quite expensive , but the more you pay for the fabric , the longer it'll last and the better it'll look . What color do you want the suit to be ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was thinking of a brown pin-striped suit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: brown , huh ? Isn't that a bit dull ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: haven't you heard ? Brown is the new black .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: why don't you just get black ? Black suits are always fashionable and can be worn for anything — a funeral , a wedding , a job interview — anything !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that may be true , but black is so boring . Anyway , I already have three black suits . I might as well get a suit that stands out from the rest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: here are two different shades of brown . Which one do you prefer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like the one on the left , but I don't like the pattern on it . It's too much . I want a pattern that's a bit subtler .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that will do . Let's go talk to the tailor about getting it made .
segments.speaker: S1
